dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.tt.RevenueAssuranceTroubleTicketSpec
dataStructure.description:
The invariant characteristics of a RevenueAssuranceTroubleTicket. Each of these instances will have the same invariant characteristics. However, the values associated with other characteristics of the instantiated RevenueAssuranceTroubleTicket will be specific to each instance.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceTroubleTicketSpec

child.name: name
child.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which a specification is known and distinguished from other RevenueAssuranceTroubleTicketSpecifications.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the specification is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of itme during which the specification is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
